phone_feat_1.title: Connect and Network
phone_feat_1.text: Connect with clients or freelancers you work with regularly, and build your network by adding new contacts.

phone_feat_2.title: INSTANT CHAT
phone_feat_2.text: Start all of your conversations in one place, share files, and make communication between contractors and clients secure and easy.

phone_feat_3.title: CHECK-LIST
phone_feat_3.text: Set milestones and tasks, keep freelancers and clients on the same page, and smooth out the project management process.

phone_feat_4.title: PERSONAL PROFILE
phone_feat_4.text: Create a profile and spotlight your skills, showcase your portfolio, and share details about your experience.
